publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1600 Angus MacKay: Draft the Budget (Scotland) Act 2000 (Amendment) (No.2) Order 2001—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft the Budget (Scotland) Act 2000 (Amendment) (No.2) Order 2001 be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock*

S1M-1600 Angus MacKay: Draft the Budget (Scotland) Act 2000 (Amendment) (No.2) Order 2001—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft the Budget (Scotland) Act 2000 (Amendment) (No.2) Order 2001 be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock
